radiographic_examinations.findings: The hepatic contour appears slightly nodular. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is trace perihepatic free fluid. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 8 mm. A mobile gallstone is noted in the gallbladder body. The gallbladder is nondistended with possible minimal gallbladder wall thickening (max 5 mm) and small pericholecystic fluid. The imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits.
